de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm

Class TCPclientCommLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm.AbstractCommunicationLayer
      • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm.TCPcommunicationLayer
        • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm.TCPclientCommLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommunicationLayer, java.io.Serializable

    public class TCPclientCommLayer
extends TCPcommunicationLayer
    Bottom OSI layer for handling TCP/IP communication of a client. Intended for communication with FORTE SERVER function blocks.
    Author:
    Marc Jakobi

    HTW Berlin

    July 2017
    See Also:
    FORTE communication architecture, Serialized Form

      • openConnection

        public boolean openConnection(CommLayerParams params)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ICommunicationLayer
        Opens the connection and sets up the communication stack. If necessary, additional layers below this layer are created.
        Specified by:
        openConnection in interface ICommunicationLayer
        Overrides:
        openConnection in class AbstractCommunicationLayer
        Parameters:
        params - CommLayerParams object holding the connection info
        Returns:
        true if the connection was opened successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
